section.title: Installing for &Windows;
section.para: You use the &BasicMiKTeXInstaller; to install &MiKTeX; on your &Windows; computer. You can download the installer from the &MiKTeX; download page.
Please read the installation tutorial, for a step-by-step guide.

section.title: Removing &MiKTeX;
section.para:
&MiKTeX; can be removed from your computer in the following way:
uninstaller

Remove MiKTeX Wizard
